sentences.sContent: We all defer to her in these matters.
sentences.sContent_eng: We all defer to her in these matters.
sentences.sCn: 在这些事情上我们都听她的。

sentences.sContent: Bear these thoughts with you as you go out into the world.
sentences.sContent_eng: Bear these thoughts with you as you go out into the world.
sentences.sCn: 当你出去走入社会时你把这些思想牢记在心。
